main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing a silver-tipped object trailing smoke moving slowly across the sky in Watertown, New York on 11 May 1949.
interesting points: The silver-tipped object was observed by several individuals over a period of about 10 minutes., The witnesses described the object as hanging like a silver ball in the sky., It was reported that the object seemed to dissolve gradually as it moved., Some witnesses reported the object leaving a visible smoke trail behind., Interviews were conducted with various witnesses to corroborate the sighting details.
witness description: Mrs. Johnson, her small son, her mother Mrs. McCarger, and additional unnamed witnesses from the area.
